meaningMnemonic: <kanji>I</kanji>, my <kanji>comrade</kanji> (which is me), is <vocabulary>I</vocabulary>, it's <vocabulary>myself</vocabulary>, it's <vocabulary>me</vocabulary>. This is a weird way to say "I" and has a hint of arrogance to it.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from the readings you learned with the kanji readings.
